titleStmt.title: Of the conscience A discourse wherein is playnely declared, the vnspeakeable ioye, and comfort of a good conscience, and the intollerable griefe and discomfort of an euill conscience. Made by Iohn Woolton, minister of the Gospell. Anno. 1576.
titleStmt.author: Woolton, John, 1535?-1594.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by H. Iackson, for Humfery Toye,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
